properties.name: snowflake.datacenter-id
properties.description: Datacenter ID (0-31). Each datacenter should have a unique datacenter ID.

properties.name: snowflake.epoch
properties.description: Epoch timestamp (milliseconds since Unix epoch). Default: 2024-01-01 00:00:00 UTC (1704067200000L)

properties.name: snowflake.worker-id
properties.description: Worker ID (0-31). Each instance should have a unique worker ID.
